forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny. High near 87, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 68, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. West southwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 84. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 64. Northwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 77. West wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight

forecast.name: Tuesday

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
